channel.title: Clip Planes on MeVisLab Examples
channel.description: Recent content in Clip Planes on MeVisLab Examples

item.title: Example 5: Clip Planes
item.description: Example 5: Clip Planes      This example is also available on YouTube. Introduction In this example, we are using the SoGVRDrawOnPlane module to define the currently visible slice from a 2D view as a clip plane in 3D. Steps to do Develop your network First we need to develop the network to scroll through the slices. Add a LocalImage module to your workspace and select the file ProbandT1 from MeVisLab demo data.
